title: Add Run tab to tick-detail-drawer for completed ticks
description:
Modify tick-detail-drawer.ts to add a 'Run' tab that shows the run record for completed ticks.

Implementation:
- Add sl-tab for 'Run' next to existing 'Details' tab
- Fetch RunRecord from /api/records/:tickId when tick is selected
- Display run-record component in the Run tab panel
- Only show Run tab for closed ticks that have a run record
- Show 'No run data' message if API returns 404

UI flow:
1. User clicks on completed tick
2. Drawer opens with Details tab selected (current behavior)
3. Run tab visible, clicking it shows run-record component
4. Loading state while fetching from API

Run: npm test -- --grep 'tick-detail-drawer'
acceptance_criteria: Run tab shows RunRecord for completed ticks, hidden for ticks without run data
closed_reason: Added Run tab to tick-detail-drawer.ts using sl-tab-group. The Run tab is only shown for closed tasks and displays run record data via the run-record component. Modified render() to use tabs with Details and Run panels, added renderDetailsContent() and renderRunTab() methods, added shouldShowRunTab() helper, and appropriate CSS for tab styling.
